headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MARA, MARY F.

snippet: MARA--Mary F.,on March 27, 2016. Sister of John and his wife Antoinette Mara. Aunt of Robert and Joseph Mara. Reposing Redden's Funeral Home, 325 West 14th Street, NYC on Friday 4pm to 8pm. Mass of Christian Burial Saturday, 9am, Church of St. Paul the Apostle, New York City. Interment Calvary Cemetery. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MARA--Mary F.,on March 27, 2016. Sister of John and his wife Antoinette Mara. Aunt of Robert and Joseph Mara.
